pageProduct.name: Organic Care Kids Bubble Bath 400ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

OC Kids Bubble Bath Tutti Fruity has plant derived ingredients. Contains no petrochemical cleansers, sles, als or parabens to make bath time happy and fun.

OC Kids Bubble Bath
The long lasting bubbles are specially formulated to make bath time happy and fun whilst leaving the skin soft and smooth.

- Not tested on animals.

Product Claims: Not tested on animals. No petrochemical cleansers, sles, als or parabens.

Size: 400mL

Scent: Tutti Fruity

Warnings

Avoid contact with eyes. If eye contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water. If rash or irritation occurs, discontinue use. For external use only.

Ingredients

Water, Coco-Glucoside*, Sodium Coco-Sulfate*, Glycerin*, Lauryl Lactyl Lactate*, Polyquaternium-10*, Fragrance, Organic Butyrospermum Parkii *(Shea) Butter, Organic Chamomilla Recutita (Chamomile) Flower Extract, Panthenol, Citric Acid*, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Benzoate, Potassium Sorbate*.
*Plant derived.

Directions

Add a small amount into running water in your bath tub and work into a foam.

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Bottle made from 100% recycled pet.
Bottle. Cap. arl.org.au.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
